partner-1-description: Collaboration with Biedronka for over 3 years. Our agency workers help manage warehouses.
partner-2-description: Collaboration with Partner 2 for staffing logistics projects.
partner-3-description: Working with Partner 3 on a major warehouse project in Warsaw.
opportunities-text: We are open to new partnerships and offer flexible collaboration conditions. Our partners get access to a large pool of qualified workers and competitive staffing conditions. Contact us to learn more about partnership opportunities.
